Security Consulting

Service detail page outlining offerings like executive protection, counter-surveillance, physical security assessments, information security assessments, law enforcement liaison, and TSCM.

Comprehensive Security Solutions

MILLERGROUP provides strategic security consulting services designed to protect people, assets, and information. Our team combines law enforcement experience with private sector expertise to deliver practical, effective security solutions.

Executive Protection Planning

We develop comprehensive executive protection strategies that balance security requirements with business operations. Our planning includes threat assessment, advance work, protective intelligence, and coordination with security personnel.

Counter-Surveillance

Our counter-surveillance services identify and mitigate unauthorized surveillance activities. We conduct surveillance detection routes, technical sweeps, and operational security assessments to protect client privacy and security.

Physical Security Assessments

We evaluate facilities, residences, and venues to identify vulnerabilities and recommend security enhancements. Our assessments cover access control, perimeter security, surveillance systems, and emergency response protocols.

Information Security Assessments

Beyond physical security, we assess information security practices and identify potential data exposure risks. Our evaluations help clients protect sensitive information and maintain operational security.

Law Enforcement Liaison

Our team's law enforcement background enables effective coordination with local, state, and federal agencies. We facilitate communication and cooperation when clients require official law enforcement involvement or support.

TSCM (Technical Surveillance Countermeasures)

We conduct technical sweeps to detect electronic surveillance devices, including hidden cameras, audio bugs, and GPS trackers. Our TSCM services protect confidential communications and sensitive environments from unauthorized monitoring.

Contact Us

For more information about our security consulting services, please contact our team.
